title: photo backup to different account
content:
I have two Google accounts.  Everything gets backup to account #1 except photos which get backed up to account #2.  When I go to the backup settings, with either account, and look at the photos and videos, it will always say "checking status...".
In any event, I want to change the photo backup account to account #1.  I change it in the backup settings.  If I then open the photos app, there will be cloud with a line through it.  If I tap the cloud, I get a "Backing up to a different account" and the account that I want to backup to and a settings gear.  Tapping the gear just takes me to the settings where I can select either of my two accounts. There is no number displayed or anything that indicates a backup is being done.  If I look at My Drive, account# 2 has no backups at all.  Account# 1 has the backups I requested but no Photo backups.
So, how can I make it backup to the account that I want and get it working?
